summary: The document is a form related to the JFK Assassination System, detailing an incident investigation involving DOD-affiliated personnel, specifically Robert Scheer. It includes his personal details and documents obtained from him during an interview in 1966, with materials related to Vietnam. The document is marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and was released with deletions in 1995.
key_findings: The document is part of the JFK Assassination System records.
It involves an investigation into DOD-affiliated personnel, specifically Robert Scheer.
Documents obtained from Scheer during an interview in 1966 are listed, including materials related to Vietnam.
The document's classification is 'UNCLASSIFIED', and it was released with deletions on 03/07/95.
